dcterms:creator: C. McCollough
dcterms:description: The Mayo Clinic Low Dose CT challenge dataset consists of ten CT scans, of which nine are used for training and one for evaluation. Each 3D image has a corresponding ultra low dose data generated by using only approximately 10% of the full data and adding additional Poisson noise, resulting in a dose corresponding to 2% of normal dose.
dcterms:title: Mayo Clinic Low Dose CT challenge
